dct_title_s: Topographic map of Mesa Verde National Park
dct_description_sm: U.S. Geological Survey, George Otis Smith, Director ; R.B. Marshall, chief geographer ; Sledge Tatum, geographer in charge ; topography by R.W. Berry and C.A. Ecklund ; control by C.F. Urquhart, M.R. McDanal, and R.M. Copeland ; engraved and printed by the U.S. Geological Survey.
Relief shown by contours and spot heights.
Oriented with north toward the upper right.
LC copy: Stamped on 508B for copy 1; 437B for copy 2 in lower left margin.
Includes inset showing "Railroad lines leading to Mesa Verde National Park."
Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
